title: Radical Ray: Australia's Little Champion for Big Change
description: Do you believe in magic?Not the kind with wands and spells, but the kind of magic you create with kindness, courage, and the choices you make every day.Meet Ray Roxby, an 8-year-old Australian boy with a big heart, a curious mind, and an unshakable belief in the power of small actions to create ripples of change. With the support of his loving family, loyal dog Atlas, and a community of friends, Ray embarks on a journey to discover what it means to live with courage, compassion, and Radical Love.From everyday challenges to unexpected adventures, Ray ✨ How kindness can transform not just others but yourself.✨ The value of forgiveness and seeing the best in people.✨ That even small hands can create big changes.Set in the Sydney suburb of Botany, Radical Ray is a heartwarming, funny, and inspiring story about finding magic in the everyday. Through Ray’s eyes, readers will discover how the lessons you learn as a kid can shape the grown-up you’ll become—helping you navigate life with an open heart and a resilient spirit.Perfect for readers aged 7-10 who love stories about kindness, courage, and making a difference, this book is an unforgettable reminder that even small choices can have a big impact.
author: Bobbi Chegwyn
